front.title: Arm's Confidential Computing Architecture (Arm CCA) Attestation Verifier Endorsements

abstract.t: Arm Confidential Computing Architecture (CCA) Endorsements comprise of reference values and cryptographic key material that a Verifier needs in order to appraise Attestation Evidence produced by an Arm CCA system. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/yogeshbdeshpande/draft-cca-rats-endorsements.
